creator: asp.adieu@gmail.com
text:
I am not sure that this should be a JMeter issue, this ticket is a result of a discussion on the jmeter-user mailing list.

We've integrated JMeter with maven / hudson (JMeterMavenPlugin is used: http://wiki.apache.org/jakarta-jmeter/JMeterMavenPlugin). After a simple test with 1 intentional failed HTTP Sampler, in Hudson we get build successful (note: in the case of junit fails - build fails).

My belief is that maven expects ERROR and JMeter sends FAILED. So if you consider this should be changed in JMeter, that will help everybody who wants to integrate JMeter in automatic testing procedures.

creator: sebb@apache.org
